document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anaphes ( Patasson ) collinus : Huber & Thuróczy, 2018: 29
(catalogue).

Alaptus pallipes Ashmead, 1887: 193
. Holotype ♀ (USNM). TL: USA , Florida , Jacksonville. Synonymy by
Huber & Thuróczy, 2018: 29
. Girault, 1908 [51]: 186 (description); Girault, 1910 [69]: 243 (description, “anaphine” affinity); Girault, 1911 [96]: 278 (generic transfer).

Mymar pallipes : Peck, 1951: 416
(catalogue);
Peck, 1963: 40
(catalogue).

Anaphes ( Patasson ) pallipes : Yoshimoto, 1990: 54
(list).

[ sic ]:
Glick, 1939: 48
(collected by airplane).

(host);
Schauff, 1984a: 48
(host).

[misidentification]:
Solomon, 1985: 12
(host, distribution).

.

subSubSection.paragraph:
